SARA is a non-profit organization in India. To know more about SARA, kindly vist our [website](https://sara-edu.netlify.app/).

This course aims to help the participants to overcome the fear of numbers, statistics and coding.

- It is an annual five days residential training program to learn statistics using R programming language. 

- Students from Underrepresented Communities are Prioritized for Selection. 

- There is no tuition fee for any participant. The fee of Rs. 6000 (70 USD) includes only the food and accommodation for five days at the SARA Institute, Dr. Ambedkar Bhawan, Sonipat, Haryana - 131001.

Email us at `sara.institute.info@gmail.com` $\cdot$ Call us at `925 315 2024`.
